## ShaderTechniqueParams.transparent property

Set to 'true' if line should appear transparent. Rendering transparent lines may come with a slight performance impact. See https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/materials/Material.transparent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transparent?: boolean;
```
